scripts.deploy: sam build --region eu-west-1 && sam package --template-file template.yml --s3-bucket %npm_package_config_bucketName% --output-template-file packaged.yaml && sam deploy --region eu-west-1 --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name %npm_package_config_stackName% --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM && aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name %npm_package_config_stackName% --region eu-west-1 --query 'Stacks[].Outputs'
